OUR
PLANET

funny panda

The big panda is a vulnerable species. Until 2017, it was considered an endangered species, characterized by an ever-decreasing population, both in the wild and in captivity. Scientists suggest that there are about 2060 individuals left in the wild.

funny dogs

The dog's psyche is the result of a joint evolution with a human. Dogs are able to perfectly understand the expression of a person's voice and face and determine his intentions. Dogs are the only animals that know how to follow where a person is looking.

funny cats

The big panda is a vulnerable species. Until 2017, it was considered an endangered species, characterized by an ever-decreasing population, both in the wild and in captivity. Scientists suggest that there are about 2060 individuals left in the wild.

beatiful
nature

Everyone knows that the time spent in nature has a good effect on our health. Every day we are surrounded by the beauty of nature, but, unfortunately, we rarely enjoy it.
